PATIENT_ID: TEST_BLOOD_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-23 22:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-23 22:10:00
Category I activation for 35-year-old male, gunshot wound to abdomen.
Hemorrhagic shock present. BP 80/50, HR 135, RR 28.
Blood transfusion initiated. PRBCs and FFP given.
Packed red blood cells administered via rapid infuser.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-23 22:40:00
Patient taken to OR emergently.
No type and cross documentation found.
No MTP documentation or blood bank notification recorded.
No laboratory data obtained prior to OR.
